hotels.title: Narita Airport Hotel with Top Floor Bar and Forest Views
hotels.description: Mere moments from the Narita International Airport, ANA Crowne Plaza Narita, an IHG Hotel, is a tranquil refuge showcasing stunning views of aviation action. Dine on splendid seasonal fare with a backdrop of verdant vistas at Restaurant Cafe Ceres, indulge in a rejuvenating treatment at the Mary Grace Spa or take a dip in the indoor pool. As evening approaches, watch the sunset while enjoying a cool cocktail at the top-floor Ski Dining SAIFU bar before retiring to a stylish room or suite.
